Frank_NNP Tremdine_NN
The_DT House_NNP Aviation_NNP Subcommittee_NNP approved_VBN a_DT bill_NN that_IN would_MD give_VB the_DT transportation_NN secretary_NN authority_NN to_TO review_VB and_CC approve_VB leveraged_JJ buy-outs_NNS of_IN major_JJ U.S._NNP airlines_NN ._.
The_DT collapsed_VBD plan_NN to_TO acquire_VB UAL_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, parent_NN of_IN United_NNP Airlines_NNPS ,_, spurred_NN quick_NN action_NN on_IN the_DT legislation_NN ,_, introduced_VBN Wednesday_NN and_CC approved_VBN by_IN the_DT subcommittee_NN on_IN a_DT voice_NN vote_NN yesterday_NN ._.
The_DT bill_NN is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT Public_NNP Works_NNP and_CC Transportation_NNP Committee_NNP tomorrow_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT floor_NN vote_NN by_IN next_JJ week_NN will_MD be_VB urged_NN ._.
The_DT measure_NN drew_VBD criticism_NN from_IN the_DT Bush_NNP administration_NN and_CC a_DT parting_NN shot_NN from_IN financier_NN Donald_NNP Trump_NNP ,_, who_WP yesterday_NN withdrew_NN his_PRP$ takeover_NN bid_NN for_IN AMR_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, the_DT parent_NN of_IN American_NNP Airlines_NNPS ._.
In_IN a_DT letter_NN to_TO subcommittee_NN Chairman_NNP James_NNP Oberstar_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- D._NNP ,_, Minn._NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, Mr._NNP Trump_NN criticized_VBN the_DT bill_NN as_IN an_DT explicit_NN effort_NN to_TO thwart_VB his_PRP$ bid_NN for_IN AMR_NNP ,_, and_CC said_VBD it_PRP contributed_VBD to_TO the_DT collapse_NN of_IN the_DT deal_NN ._.

The_DT bill_NN is_VBZ aimed_VBN at_IN addressing_NN the_DT concern_NN that_IN an_DT airline_NN might_MD sacrifice_VB costly_JJ safety_NN measures_NNS to_TO pay_VB off_RP the_DT debt_NN incurred_VBN in_IN a_DT leveraged_JJ buy-out_NN ._.

In_IN general_JJ ,_, the_DT bill_NN would_MD give_VB the_DT Transportation_NNP Department_NNP a_DT 30-day_JJ review_NN period_NN before_IN 15_CD %_NN or_CC more_JJR of_IN the_DT voting_NN stock_NN of_IN a_DT major_JJ U.S._NNP air_NN carrier_NN could_MD be_VB acquired_VBN ._.

The_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP adopted_VBN two_NN specific_JJ circuit_NN breakers_NNS :_: If_NN the_DT Dow_NNP Jones_NNP index_NN falls_NN 250_NN points_NNS in_IN a_DT day_NN ,_, the_DT exchange_NN will_MD halt_NN trading_NN for_IN one_CD hour_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT decline_NN hits_VBZ 400_NN points_NNS ,_, the_DT exchange_NN will_MD close_VB for_IN an_DT additional_JJ two_CD hours_NNS ._.

Here_RB are_VBP auction_NN details_NNS :_:
Rates_NNS are_VBP determined_VBN by_IN the_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT purchase_NN price_NN and_CC face_NN value_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, higher_JJR bidding_NN narrows_VBZ the_DT investor_NN 's_POS return_NN while_IN lower_JJR bidding_NN widens_VBZ it_PRP ._.
The_DT percentage_NN rates_NNS are_VBP calculated_VBN on_IN a_DT 360-day_JJ year_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT coupon-equivalent_JJ yield_VB is_NN based_VBN on_IN a_DT 365-day_JJ year_NN ._.
Both_DT issues_NNS are_VBP dated_VBN Oct._NNP 19_CD ._.
The_DT 13-week_JJ bills_NNS mature_VBP Jan._NNP 18_NN ,_, 1990_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT 26-week_JJ bills_NNS mature_VBP April_NNP 19_NN ,_, 1990_NN ._.

Population_NN Drain_NN Ends_NN For_NN Midwestern_NN States_NNPS
IOWA_NN IS_NN MAKING_NN a_DT comeback_NN ._.
So_RB are_VBP Indiana_NN ,_, Ohio_NN and_CC Michigan_NNP ._.
The_DT population_NN of_IN all_DT four_CD states_NNS is_VBZ on_IN the_DT upswing_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO new_JJ Census_NN Bureau_NN estimates_NNS ,_, following_VBG declines_NNS throughout_IN the_DT early_JJ 1980s_CD ._.
The_DT gains_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB sure_JJ ,_, are_VBP rather_NN small_NN ._.
Iowa_NNP ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, saw_VBD its_PRP$ population_NN grow_NN by_IN 11,000_NN people_NNS ,_, or_CC 0.4_NN %_NN ,_, between_NN 1987_NN and_CC 1988_NN ,_, the_DT Census_NNP Bureau_NNP says_VBZ ._.

The_DT Northeast_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN holding_VBG its_PRP$ own_JJ in_IN the_DT population_NN race_NN ._.

More_JJR Elderly_NN Maintain_NN Their_NN Independence_NN
THANKS_NN TO_TO modern_NN medicine_NN ,_, more_JJR couples_NN are_VBP growing_VBG old_NN together_RB ._.
And_CC even_RB after_IN losing_VBG a_DT spouse_NN ,_, more_JJR of_IN the_DT elderly_JJ are_VBP staying_NN independent_NN ._.
A_DT new_JJ Census_NN Bureau_NN study_NN of_IN the_DT noninstitutionalized_NN population_NN shows_VBZ that_IN 64_CD %_NN of_IN people_NNS aged_VBN 65_CD to_TO 74_CD were_NN living_VBG with_IN a_DT spouse_NN in_IN 1988_CD ,_, up_RP from_IN 59_NN %_NN in_IN 1970_CD ._.
This_DT does_VBZ n't_RB mean_VB they_PRP 're_VBP less_JJR likely_JJ to_TO live_VB alone_RB ,_, however_RB ._.
That_DT share_NN has_VBZ remained_VBD at_IN about_IN 24_NN %_NN since_IN 1970_CD ._.
What_WP has_VBZ changed_VBN is_VBZ that_IN more_JJR of_IN the_DT young_JJ elderly_NN are_VBP living_VBG with_IN spouses_NN rather_RB than_IN with_IN other_JJ relatives_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN children_NN ._.
In_IN 1988_CD ,_, 10_CD %_NN of_IN those_DT aged_NN 65_NN to_TO 74_NN lived_NN with_IN relatives_NN other_NN than_IN spouses_NN ,_, down_RB from_IN 15_CD %_NN in_IN 1970_CD ._.

But_CC even_RB among_NN those_NN aged_NN 75_NN and_CC older_JJR ,_, the_DT share_NN living_VBG with_IN a_DT spouse_NN rose_VBD slightly_RB ,_, to_TO 40_CD %_NN in_IN 1988_CD from_IN 38_CD %_NN in_IN 1970_CD ._.
Like_IN their_PRP$ younger_JJR counterparts_NN ,_, the_DT older_JJR elderly_NN are_VBP less_JJR likely_JJ to_TO live_VB with_IN other_JJ relatives_NN ._.
Only_RB 17_NN %_NN of_IN those_DT aged_NN 75_NN and_CC older_JJR lived_NN with_IN relatives_NN other_NN than_IN spouses_NN in_IN 1988_CD ,_, down_RB from_IN 26_NN %_NN in_IN 1970_CD ._.
The_DT likelihood_NN of_IN living_VBG alone_RB beyond_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN 75_CD has_VBZ increased_VBN to_TO 40_CD %_NN from_IN 32_CD %_NN ._.

Careers_NN Count_NN Most_JJS For_NN the_DT Well-to-Do_NN

Raymond_NNP Weber_NN

The_DT Fifth_NN Amendment_NN states_NNS in_IN relevant_NN part_NN that_IN no_DT person_NN ``_`` shall_NN be_VB compelled_NN ,_, in_IN any_DT criminal_JJ case_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB a_DT witness_NN against_IN himself_PRP ._. ''_''
This_DT privilege_NN against_IN self-incrimination_NN precludes_NN the_DT drawing_VBG of_IN an_DT adverse_JJ inference_NN against_IN a_DT criminal_JJ defendant_NN who_WP chooses_VBZ not_RB to_TO testify_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, in_IN a_DT criminal_JJ case_NN ,_, a_DT prosecutor_NN can_MD not_RB comment_VB on_IN a_DT defendant_NN 's_POS failure_NN to_TO testify_NN nor_NN can_MD the_DT defendant_NN be_VB compelled_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT stand_VBP as_IN a_DT witness_NN ,_, thus_RB forcing_NN him_NN to_TO ``_`` take_VB the_DT Fifth_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT privilege_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN limited_JJ in_IN accordance_NN with_IN its_PRP$ plain_NN language_NN to_TO protect_VB the_DT defendant_NN in_IN criminal_JJ matters_NNS only_RB ._.
The_DT Supreme_NNP Court_NNP and_CC some_DT states_NNS have_VBP specifically_RB recognized_NN that_IN ``_`` the_DT Fifth_NN Amendment_NN does_VBZ not_RB preclude_VB the_DT inference_NN where_WRB the_DT privilege_NN is_VBZ claimed_NN by_IN a_DT party_NN to_TO a_DT civil_JJ cause_NN ._. ''_''
Baxter_NNP v._IN Palmingiano_NN ,_, 425_NN U.S._NNP 308_NN -LRB-_-LRB- 1976_NN -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Thus_RB ,_, in_IN a_DT civil_JJ case_NN ,_, a_DT defendant_NN may_MD be_VB called_VBN as_IN a_DT witness_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD be_VB forced_VBN to_TO testify_VB or_CC take_VB the_DT Fifth_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ taking_VBG of_IN the_DT Fifth_NNP may_MD permit_NN the_DT drawing_VBG of_IN an_DT adverse_JJ inference_NN against_IN him_PRP in_IN the_DT civil_JJ matter_NN ._.
He_PRP may_MD take_VB the_DT Fifth_NN in_IN a_DT civil_JJ matter_NN only_RB if_IN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT good_JJ faith_NN and_CC justifiable_NN belief_NN that_IN his_PRP$ testimony_NN may_MD subject_JJ him_NN to_TO criminal_JJ prosecution_NN ._.
Allowing_NN the_DT defendant_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT Fifth_NN in_IN a_DT civil_JJ matter_NN is_VBZ not_RB based_VBN on_IN a_DT constitutional_JJ right_NN to_TO refuse_VB to_TO testify_VB where_WRB one_CD 's_POS testimony_NN harms_NN him_NN in_IN the_DT civil_JJ matter_NN ,_, but_CC because_IN the_DT testimony_NN in_IN the_DT civil_JJ matter_NN could_MD be_VB unconstitutionally_NN used_VBN against_IN him_PRP in_IN a_DT subsequent_JJ criminal_JJ prosecution_NN ._.
Absent_NN the_DT risk_NN of_IN such_JJ prosecution_NN ,_, a_DT court_NN may_MD order_NN the_DT defendant_NN to_TO testify_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, when_WRB Mr._NNP Pierce_NN asserted_VBD the_DT Fifth_NN in_IN a_DT noncriminal_NN proceeding_NN ,_, particularly_RB after_IN presumably_NN receiving_NN extensive_NN advice_NN from_IN legal_JJ counsel_NN ,_, one_CD must_NN conclude_NN that_IN he_PRP held_VBN a_DT good-faith_NN ,_, justifiable_NN belief_NN that_IN his_PRP$ testimony_NN could_MD be_VB used_VBN against_IN him_PRP in_IN a_DT subsequent_JJ criminal_JJ prosecution_NN ._.
The_DT subcommittee_NN ,_, Congress_NNP and_CC the_DT American_NNP public_JJ have_VBP every_NN right_NN to_TO draw_VB the_DT adverse_JJ inference_NN and_CC to_TO concur_NN with_IN Mr._NNP Pierce_NNP 's_POS own_JJ belief_NN that_IN his_PRP$ testimony_NN could_MD help_VB convict_NN him_NN of_IN a_DT crime_NN ._.

Estes_NN Park_NN ,_, Colo_NN ._.

Just_RB a_DT coincidence_NN ?_.

One_CD strategy_NN for_IN investors_NNS who_WP want_VBP to_TO stay_NN in_IN but_CC hedge_NN their_NN bets_NN is_VBZ to_TO buy_VB ``_`` put_VB ''_'' options_NN ,_, either_CC on_IN the_DT individual_JJ stocks_NNS they_PRP own_JJ or_CC on_IN a_DT broad_JJ market_NN index_NN ._.
A_DT put_VB option_NN gives_NN its_NN holder_NN the_DT right_NN -LRB-_-LRB- but_CC not_NN the_DT obligation_NN -RRB-_-RRB- to_TO sell_VB a_DT stock_NN -LRB-_-LRB- or_CC stock_NN index_NN -RRB-_-RRB- for_IN a_DT specified_VBN price_NN -LRB-_-LRB- the_DT strike_NN price_NN -RRB-_-RRB- until_NN the_DT option_NN expires_VBZ ._.
Whether_IN this_DT insurance_NN is_VBZ worthwhile_NN depends_NN on_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN an_DT option_NN ._.
The_DT cost_NN ,_, or_CC premium_NN ,_, tends_NN to_TO get_VB fat_JJ in_IN times_NNS of_IN crisis_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, buying_VBG puts_NN after_IN a_DT big_JJ market_NN slide_NN can_MD be_VB an_DT expensive_JJ way_NN to_TO hedge_VB against_IN risk_NN ._.
The_DT prices_NNS of_IN puts_NN generally_NN did_VBD n't_RB soar_NN Friday_NN ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT premium_NN as_IN a_DT percentage_NN of_IN the_DT stock_NN price_NN for_IN certain_JJ puts_NN on_IN Eli_NNP Lilly_NNP &_CC Co._NNP moved_VBD up_RP from_IN 3_CD %_NN at_IN Thursday_NNP 's_POS close_VB to_TO only_RB 3.3_NN %_NN at_IN Friday_NNP 's_POS close_VB ,_NN even_RB though_IN the_DT shares_NNS dropped_VBD more_JJR than_IN $_$ 5.50_CD ._.
But_CC put-option_NN prices_NNS may_MD zoom_NN when_NN trading_NN resumes_NN today_NN ._.
It_PRP 's_POS hard_JJ to_TO generalize_VB about_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ price_NN for_IN puts_NN ._.
But_CC investors_NNS should_MD keep_VB in_IN mind_NN ,_, before_IN paying_NN too_RB much_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT average_JJ annual_JJ return_NN for_IN stock_NN holdings_NNS ,_, long-term_JJ ,_, is_VBZ 9_NN %_NN to_TO 10_CD %_NN a_DT year_NN ;_: a_DT return_NN of_IN 15_CD %_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN praiseworthy_NN ._.
Paying_VBG ,_NN say_VBP ,_, 10_CD %_NN for_IN insurance_NN against_IN losses_NNS takes_NN a_DT deep_NN bite_NN out_RP of_IN the_DT return_NN ._.
James_NNP A._NNP White_NNP and_CC Tom_NN Herman_NN contributed_VBD to_TO this_DT article_NN ._.
Coldwell_NN Banker_NN Commercial_NN Group_NN said_VBD it_PRP sold_VBN $_NN 47_NN million_NN of_IN common_JJ stock_NN to_TO its_PRP$ employees_NNS at_IN $_$ 10_CD a_DT share_NN ,_, giving_VBG them_PRP a_DT total_JJ stake_NN of_IN more_JJR than_IN 40_CD %_NN in_IN the_DT commercial_JJ real_JJ estate_NN brokerage_NN firm_NN ._.
The_DT firm_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD acquired_VBN in_IN April_NNP from_IN Sears_NNP ,_, Roebuck_NNP &_CC Co._NNP in_IN a_DT management-led_JJ buy-out_NN ,_, had_VBD planned_VBN to_TO sell_VB up_RP to_TO $_$ 56.4_NN million_NN of_IN stock_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT 50_CD %_NN stake_NN in_IN the_DT company_NN ,_, to_TO its_PRP$ 5,000_NN employees_NNS ._.
Though_IN the_DT offering_NN did_VBD n't_RB sell_VB out_RP ,_, James_NN J._NN Didion_NN ,_, chairman_NN and_CC chief_JJ executive_NN officer_NN ,_, said_VBD ,_, ``_`` We_PRP 're_VBP pretty_RB proud_JJ of_IN the_DT employees_NNS '_POS response_NN ._. ''_''
He_PRP noted_VBD that_IN unlike_NN an_DT employee_NN stock_NN ownership_NN plan_NN ,_, where_WRB a_DT company_NN usually_RB borrows_NN money_NN from_IN third_JJ party_NN lenders_NNS to_TO buy_VB stock_NN that_IN it_PRP sets_NNS aside_RB to_TO award_NN employees_NN over_IN time_NN ,_, here_NN employees_NNS had_VBD to_TO fork_NN out_RP their_PRP$ own_JJ cash_NN for_IN the_DT stock_NN ._.
``_`` They_PRP came_NN up_RP with_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ money_NN instead_RB of_IN borrowed_NN money_NN ,_, ''_'' Mr._NNP Didion_NN said_VBD ._.
``_`` It_PRP 's_POS totally_NN different_NN ._. ''_''
He_PRP said_VBD the_DT offering_NN was_VBD designed_VBN to_TO create_NN long-term_JJ incentives_NN for_IN employees_NNS ._.
``_`` We_PRP 're_VBP in_IN a_DT service_NN business_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_IN context_NN ,_, it_PRP 's_POS vital_NN to_TO have_VBP your_NN employees_NNS involved_VBN in_IN the_DT ownership_NN so_RB they_NN have_VBP a_DT stake_NN in_IN the_DT success_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT brokerage_NN firm_NN wo_MD n't_RB pay_VB a_DT dividend_NN on_IN the_DT stock_NN ._.
Employees_NNS have_VBP the_DT right_NN to_TO trade_NN stock_NN among_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT company_NN will_MD establish_VB an_DT internal_JJ clearing_NN house_NN for_IN these_DT transactions_NNS ._.
They_PRP may_MD also_RB eventually_RB sell_VB the_DT shares_NNS to_TO third_JJ parties_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT outside_IN investors_NN who_WP own_JJ the_DT remaining_VBG 60_NN %_NN of_IN Coldwell_NN Banker_NN have_VBP the_DT right_NN to_TO first_JJ refusal_NN ._.
Those_DT outside_IN investors_NN in_IN Coldwell_NN Banker_NN include_VBP Carlyle_NN Group_NN ,_, a_DT closely_RB held_VBN Washington_NN ,_, D.C._NN ,_, merchant_NN banking_NN firm_NN whose_WP$ co-chairman_NN is_VBZ Frank_NN Carlucci_NN ,_, former_JJ secretary_NN of_IN defense_NN ;_: Frederic_NN V._NN Malek_NN ,_, senior_JJ adviser_NN to_TO Carlyle_NN Group_NN ;_: Mellon_NN Family_NN Trust_NN of_IN Pittsburgh_NNP ;_: Westinghouse_NN Credit_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, the_DT financial_JJ services_NNS unit_NN of_IN Westinghouse_NNP Electric_NNP Corp._NNP ;_: Bankers_NNPS Trust_NN Co._NN ,_, a_DT unit_NN of_IN Bankers_NNPS Trust_NNP New_NNP York_NNP Corp._NNP ;_: and_CC a_DT group_NN of_IN Japanese_JJ investors_NNS represented_VBD by_IN the_DT investment_NN banking_NN unit_NN of_IN Tokyo-based_JJ Sumitomo_NN Bank_NNP ._.
Bankers_NNPS Trust_NNP and_CC Sumitomo_NN financed_NN the_DT $_$ 300_CD million_CD acquisition_NN from_IN Sears_NNP Roebuck_NN ._.
Coldwell_NN Banker_NN also_RB named_VBN three_NN outside_IN director_NN nominees_NN for_IN its_PRP$ 17_NN member_NN board_NN ._.
The_DT nominees_NN are_VBP Gary_NN Wilson_NN ,_, chief_JJ financial_JJ officer_NN of_IN Walt_NNP Disney_NNP Co._NNP ;_: James_NN Montgomery_NN ,_, chief_JJ executive_NN officer_NN of_IN Great_NNP Western_NNP Financial_NNP Corp._NNP ;_: and_CC Peter_NN Ubberroth_NN ,_, former_JJ commissioner_NN of_IN baseball_NN and_CC now_RB a_DT private_JJ investor_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ major_JJ event_NN this_DT morning_NN in_IN U.S._NNP stock_NN and_CC futures_NNS trading_NN may_MD be_VB a_DT pause_NN at_IN the_DT Chicago_NNP Mercantile_NNP Exchange_NNP ._.
Under_IN a_DT reform_NN arising_NN from_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ,_, trading_NN in_IN the_DT Merc_NNP 's_POS stock-index_NN futures_NN will_MD break_VB for_IN 10_NN minutes_NN if_IN the_DT contract_NN opens_VBZ and_CC stays_NN five_NN points_NNS from_IN Friday_NNP 's_POS close_VB ,_NN a_DT move_NN equal_JJ to_TO 40_NN points_NNS on_IN the_DT Dow_NNP Jones_NNP Industrial_NNP Average_NNP ._.
The_DT aim_NN of_IN the_DT interruption_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO ease_VB the_DT opening_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP ,_, which_WDT would_MD be_VB hammered_NN by_IN such_JJ a_DT volatile_NN move_NN on_IN the_DT Merc_NNP ._.
That_DT early-morning_NN breather_NN is_VBZ just_RB one_CD of_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN safeguards_NN adopted_VBN after_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ._.
The_DT Big_NNP Board_NNP also_RB added_VBD computer_NN capacity_NN to_TO handle_VB huge_JJ surges_NN in_IN trading_NN volume_NN ._.
Several_JJ of_IN those_DT post-crash_JJ changes_NNS kicked_NN in_IN during_NN Friday_NNP 's_POS one-hour_JJ collapse_NN and_CC worked_VBD as_IN expected_VBN ,_, even_RB though_IN they_PRP did_VBD n't_RB prevent_VB a_DT stunning_NN plunge_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT major_JJ ``_`` circuit_NN breakers_NNS ''_'' have_VBP yet_RB to_TO be_VB evaluated_NN ._.
A_DT deeper_JJR market_NN plunge_NN today_NN could_MD give_VB them_PRP their_NN first_JJ test_NN ._.
A_DT further_JJ slide_NN also_RB would_MD resurrect_NN debate_NN over_IN a_DT host_NN of_IN other_JJ ,_, more_JJR sweeping_JJ changes_NNS proposed_VBN --_NN but_CC not_RB implemented_NN --_: after_IN the_DT last_JJ crash_NN ._.
Most_JJS notably_NN ,_, several_JJ of_IN the_DT regulatory_JJ steps_NNS recommended_VBD by_IN the_DT Brady_NNP Task_NN Force_NN ,_, which_WDT analyzed_NN the_DT 1987_NN crash_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB revived_VBN --_: especially_NN because_IN that_IN group_NN 's_POS chairman_NN is_VBZ now_RB the_DT Treasury_NNP secretary_NN ._.
The_DT most_JJS controversial_JJ of_IN the_DT Brady_NNP recommendations_NN involved_VBN establishing_NN a_DT single_NN overarching_NN regulator_NN to_TO handle_VB crucial_JJ cross-market_NN questions_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN setting_VBG consistent_NN margin_NN requirements_NNS for_IN the_DT stock_NN and_CC futures_NNS markets_NNS ._.
But_CC for_IN the_DT moment_NN ,_, attention_NN focuses_NN on_IN the_DT reforms_NNS that_IN were_VBD put_VB into_NN place_NN ,_, and_CC market_NN regulators_NNS and_CC participants_NN said_VBD the_DT circuit_NN breakers_NN worked_VBD as_IN intended_VBN ._.
Big_NNP Board_NNP and_CC Merc_NN officials_NNS expressed_VBD satisfaction_NN with_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN two_CD limits_NNS imposed_NN on_IN of_IN the_DT Merc_NNP 's_POS Standard_NNP &_CC Poor_NNP 's_POS 500_CD contract_NN ,_, as_IN well_RB as_IN ``_`` hot-line_NN ''_'' communications_NNS among_NN exchanges_NN ._.
Those_DT pauses_NN --_: from_IN 2:07_NN p.m._NN to_TO 2:30_NN p.m._NN CDT_NN and_CC from_IN 2:45_NN p.m._NN until_IN the_DT close_VB of_IN trading_NN a_DT half-hour_NN later_RB --_: forced_VBN traders_NN to_TO buy_VB and_CC sell_VB contracts_NNS at_IN prices_NNS at_IN or_CC higher_JJR than_IN their_PRP$ frozen_JJ levels_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT first_JJ halt_NN ,_, after_IN the_DT S&P_NNP index_NN had_VBD fallen_VBN 12_NN points_NNS ,_, the_DT Big_NNP Board_NNP 's_POS ``_`` Sidecar_NN ''_'' computer_NN program_NN automatically_NN was_VBD triggered_VBN ._.
That_DT system_NN is_VBZ designed_VBN to_TO separate_NN computer-generated_NN program_NN trades_NNS from_IN all_DT other_JJ trades_NNS to_TO help_VB exchange_NN officials_NNS resolve_NN order_NN imbalances_NN in_IN individual_JJ stocks_NNS ._.
One_CD Merc_NN broker_NN compared_VBN the_DT action_NN in_IN the_DT S&P_NNP pit_NN during_IN the_DT two_CD freezes_NN to_TO a_DT fire_NN at_IN a_DT well-drilled_NN school_NN ._.
``_`` You_PRP do_VBP n't_RB want_VBP the_DT fire_NN but_CC you_PRP know_VB what_WP to_TO do_VBP ,_NN ''_'' said_VBD Howard_NNP Dubnow_NN ,_, an_DT independent_JJ floor_NN broker_NN and_CC a_DT Merc_NN governor_NN ._.
``_`` There_EX was_VBD no_DT panic_NN ._.
The_DT system_NN worked_VBD the_DT way_NN we_PRP devised_NN it_NN to_TO work_NN ._. ''_''
After_IN reopening_NN for_IN about_IN 15_CD minutes_NNS ,_, the_DT S&P_NNP index_NN tumbled_NN to_TO its_PRP$ 30-point_NN limit_NN and_CC the_DT second_JJ freeze_NN went_NN into_IN effect_NN ._.
Traders_NNS then_NN spent_VBD the_DT last_JJ half-hour_NN ``_`` watching_NN to_TO see_VB if_IN the_DT Dow_NNP would_MD drop_NN 250_NN points_NNS ,_, ''_'' Mr._NNP Dubnow_NN added_VBD ,_, referring_VBG to_TO the_DT level_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT stock_NN market_NN itself_PRP would_MD have_VBP closed_VBD for_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.
One_CD observer_NN estimated_VBN that_IN 80_NN %_NN to_TO 90_NN %_NN of_IN the_DT S&P_NNP traders_NNS ``_`` were_VBD just_RB standing_NN around_IN watching_VBG ._. ''_''
But_CC the_DT 250-point_NN circuit_NN breaker_NN never_RB had_VBD to_TO kick_NN in_IN ,_, and_CC freezes_NN on_IN the_DT Chicago_NNP Board_NNP of_IN Trade_NNP 's_POS Major_NN Market_NNP Index_NNP also_RB were_VBD n't_RB triggered_VBN ._.
The_DT MMI_NNP and_CC the_DT S&P_NNP 500_CD are_VBP the_DT two_CD major_JJ indexes_NN used_VBN by_IN program_NN traders_NNS to_TO run_VB their_PRP$ computerized_NN trading_NN strategies_NNS ._.
The_DT programs_NNS are_VBP considered_VBN by_IN many_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT major_JJ cause_NN of_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ._.
The_DT process_NN of_IN post-crash_JJ reforms_NNS began_VBD with_IN calls_VBZ to_TO remake_NN the_DT markets_NNS and_CC wound_NN up_RP a_DT year_NN later_RB with_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN rather_RB technical_NN adjustments_NN ._.
In_IN October_NNP 1987_CD ,_, just_RB after_IN the_DT market_NN drop_NN ,_, Washington_NNP was_VBD awash_NN in_IN talk_VB of_IN sweeping_JJ changes_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN the_DT financial_JJ markets_NNS are_VBP structured_VBN and_CC regulated_NN ._.
Over_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN that_IN grand_NN agenda_NN was_VBD whittled_NN down_RB to_TO a_DT series_NN of_IN steps_NNS to_TO soften_VB big_JJ stock_NN drops_NNS by_IN interrupting_NN trading_NN to_TO give_VB market_NN players_NNS time_NN to_TO pause_NN and_CC reconsider_NN positions_NNS ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, limits_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN on_IN computer-driven_NN trading_NN ,_, and_CC steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO better_JJR link_NN the_DT stock_NN and_CC futures_NNS markets_NNS ._.
Few_JJ changes_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT way_NN the_DT markets_NNS are_VBP regulated_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT outset_NN the_DT prime_NN target_NN was_VBD program_NN trading_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD much_JJ discussed_NN but_CC little_JJ understood_NN on_IN Capitol_NNP Hill_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD also_RB calls_VBZ to_TO strip_VB the_DT stock_NN markets_NNS of_IN ``_`` derivative_JJ ''_'' products_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN stock-index_NN futures_NNS and_CC options_NNS ,_, which_WDT Federal_NNP Judge_NNP Stanley_NN Sporkin_NN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, likened_VBD to_TO ``_`` barnacles_NN attached_VBN to_TO the_DT basic_NN market_NN ._. ''_''
And_CC there_EX was_VBD much_JJ criticism_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP 's_POS system_NN of_IN having_VBG stock_NN trades_NNS flow_NN through_IN specialists_NNS ,_, or_CC market_NN makers_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT Brady_NN Task_NN Force_NN 's_POS powerful_NN analysis_NN of_IN the_DT crash_NN was_VBD released_VBN in_IN January_NNP 1988_CD ,_, it_PRP immediately_RB reshaped_NN the_DT reformers_NN '_POS agenda_NN ._.
Arguing_NN that_IN the_DT separate_JJ financial_JJ marketplaces_NN acted_NN as_IN one_CD ,_, and_CC concluding_NN that_IN the_DT crash_NN had_VBD ``_`` raised_VBD the_DT possibility_NN of_IN a_DT full-scale_NN financial_JJ system_NN breakdown_NN ,_, ''_'' the_DT presidential_NN task_NN force_NN called_VBN for_IN establishing_NN a_DT super-regulator_NN to_TO oversee_NN the_DT markets_NNS ,_, to_TO make_VB margins_NNS consistent_NN across_IN markets_NNS ,_, to_TO unify_NN clearing_NN systems_NNS and_CC to_TO install_NN circuit_NN breakers_NN ._.
Only_RB the_DT last_JJ of_IN those_DT recommendations_NNS ever_NN was_VBD implemented_NN ._.
The_DT Reagan_NNP White_NNP House_NNP held_VBN the_DT Brady_NN recommendations_NN at_IN arm_NN 's_POS length_NN and_CC named_VBN a_DT second_JJ panel_NN --_: the_DT Working_NN Group_NN on_IN the_DT Financial_NNP Markets_NNPS --_: to_TO review_NN its_PRP$ analysis_NN and_CC those_DT of_IN other_JJ crash_NN studies_NNS ._.
In_IN May_NNP 1988_CD ,_, the_DT Working_NN Group_NN ,_, made_VBN up_RP of_IN representatives_NN from_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP ,_, the_DT Treasury_NNP ,_, the_DT Securities_NNPS and_CC Exchange_NNP Commission_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Commodity_NN Futures_NNPS Trading_NN Commission_NN ,_, finally_RB endorsed_NN only_RB circuit_NN breakers_NN ._.
After_IN several_JJ more_JJR months_NN of_IN arguments_NN among_IN various_JJ stock_NN exchanges_NNS and_CC futures_NNS markets_NNS ,_, circuit_NN breakers_NNS were_VBD set_VBN in_IN place_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT most_JJS notable_NN suspending_NN trading_NN after_IN 250_CD and_CC 400_CD point_NN drops_NN in_IN the_DT Dow_NNP Jones_NNP Industrial_NNP Average_NNP ._.
Privately_RB ,_, some_DT free_JJ marketeers_NN dismissed_VBN such_JJ mechanisms_NN as_IN sops_NN to_TO interventionists_NN ._.
After_IN all_DT ,_, this_DT free-market_JJ argument_NN went_NN ,_, the_DT Dow_NNP only_RB dropped_VBD more_JJR than_IN 250_NN points_NNS once_RB this_DT century_NN ._.
``_`` Circuit_NN breakers_NNS ''_'' set_VBN to_TO soften_NN big_NN drops_VBZ :_:
--_: If_NN S&P_NNP futures_NN fall_NN 5_NN points_NNS at_IN opening_NN ,_, contract_NN trading_NN pauses_NN for_IN 10_CD minutes_NNS ._.
--_: If_NN Dow_NN Industrials_NN fall_NN 25_NN points_NNS at_IN opening_NN ,_, contract_NN trading_NN pauses_NN for_IN 10_CD minutes_NNS ._.
--_: If_NN S&P_NNP futures_NN fall_NN 12_NN points_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- equivalent_NN to_TO about_IN 100_NN points_NNS on_IN DJIA_NN -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, trading_NN is_VBZ frozen_JJ for_IN half_NN hour_NN to_TO that_IN price_NN or_CC higher_JJR ._.
On_IN NYSE_NN program_NN trades_NNS are_VBP diverted_NN into_IN a_DT separate_JJ computer_NN file_NN to_TO determine_VB buy_VB and_CC sell_VB orders_NNS ._.
--_: If_NN S&P_NNP futures_NN fall_NN 30_NN points_NNS ,_, trading_NN is_VBZ restricted_VBN for_IN an_DT hour_NN to_TO that_IN price_NN or_CC higher_JJR ._.
--_: If_NN Dow_NN Industrials_NN fall_NN 250_NN points_NNS ,_, trading_NN on_IN the_DT Big_NNP Board_NNP halts_NNS for_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.
S&P_NNP and_CC MMI_NN contracts_NNS also_RB halt_NN ._.
--_: If_NN DJIA_NN drops_VBZ 400_NN points_NNS ,_, Big_NNP Board_NNP halts_NNS trading_NN for_IN two_CD hours_NNS ._.
Trading_NN in_IN MMI_NN and_CC S&P_NNP futures_NN also_RB halted_NN ._.
Brady_NNP Task_NN Force_NN recommendations_NN -LRB-_-LRB- Jan._NN 1988_NN -RRB-_-RRB- :_NN
--_: Establish_NN an_DT overarching_NN regulator_NN for_IN financial_JJ markets_NNS
--_: Unify_NN trade-clearing_NN systems_NNS
--_: Make_NN margins_NN consistent_NN across_IN stock_NN and_CC futures_NNS markets_NNS
SEC_NNP proposals_NN -LRB-_-LRB- May_NNP 1988_NN -RRB-_-RRB- :_NN
--_: Require_NN prompt_NN reports_NNS of_IN large_JJ securities_NNS trades_NNS ._.
--_: Give_VB SEC_NN authority_NN to_TO monitor_VB risk-taking_NN by_IN affiliates_NN of_IN brokerage_NN firms_NNS ._.
--_: Transfer_NN jurisdiction_NN over_IN stock-related_NN futures_NNS to_TO SEC_NN from_IN CFTC_NN ._.
-LRB-_-LRB- Opposed_NN by_IN new_JJ SEC_NNP chairman_NN -RRB-_-RRB-
--_: Give_VB SEC_NN authority_NN to_TO halt_VB securities_NNS trading_NN ,_, -LRB-_-LRB- also_NN opposed_VBN by_IN new_JJ SEC_NNP chairman_NN -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Congressional_JJ proposal_NN :_:
--_: Create_NN a_DT task_NN force_NN to_TO review_VB current_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT securities_NNS markets_NNS and_CC securities_NNS laws_NN ._.
Breaking_VBG the_DT Soviet_JJ government_NN 's_POS television_NN monopoly_NN ,_, an_DT independent_JJ company_NN has_VBZ gained_VBD rights_NN to_TO show_NN world_NN programming_NN ,_, including_VBG American_NNP films_NN ._.
``_`` There_EX must_NN not_NN be_VB a_DT monopoly_NN ,_, there_EX must_MD be_VB freedom_NN of_IN choice_NN for_IN both_DT journalists_NN and_CC viewers_NN ,_, ''_'' Nikolai_NN I._NN Lutsenko_NN ,_, the_DT president_NN of_IN the_DT Nika_NN TV_NN company_NN ,_, told_VBD the_DT weekly_JJ newspaper_NN Nedelya_NN ._.
The_DT company_NN is_VBZ already_RB working_VBG on_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ programming_NN in_IN several_JJ provincial_NN cities_NN and_CC hopes_VBZ to_TO be_VB on_IN the_DT air_NN regularly_NN in_IN about_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT newspaper_NN said_VBD ._.
Mr._NNP Lutsenko_NN told_VBD Nedelya_NN that_IN he_PRP recently_RB had_VBD been_VBN to_TO the_DT U.S._NNP to_TO pick_VB up_RP the_DT rights_NN to_TO show_NN 5,000_NN U.S._NNP films_NN in_IN the_DT Soviet_JJ Union_NNP ._.
Nedelya_NN 's_POS article_NN was_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT picture_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Lutsenko_NN interviewing_NN singer_NN John_NNP Denver_NN in_IN Colorado_NNP ._.
Even_RB though_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB independent_JJ of_IN official_NN television_NN ,_, Nika_NN will_MD have_VBP an_DT oversight_NN board_NN that_IN will_MD include_VBP members_NNS of_IN the_DT Communist_NNP youth_NN league_NN ._.
South_NNP Africa_NNP 's_POS National_NNP Union_NNP of_IN Mineworkers_NNPS said_VBD that_IN about_IN 10,000_CD diamond_NN miners_NN struck_NN for_IN higher_JJR wages_NNS at_IN De_NN Beers_NN Consolidated_NN Mines_NNP Ltd._NNP
De_NN Beers_NN said_VBD that_IN workers_NN at_IN five_CD of_IN the_DT group_NN 's_POS mines_NN were_VBD on_IN strike_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP said_VBD was_VBD peaceful_NN ,_, with_IN orderly_NN picketing_NN occurring_NN at_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT mines_NNS ._.
The_DT deadlock_NN in_IN negotiations_NNS occurred_VBD with_IN De_NN Beers_NN offering_NN a_DT 17_NN %_NN increase_NN in_IN the_DT minimum-wage_NN category_NN while_IN the_DT union_NN demanded_VBD a_DT 37.6_NN %_NN increase_NN in_IN the_DT minimum_JJ wage_NN ._.
Japan_NNP 's_POS opposition_NN Socialist_NNP Party_NNP denied_VBD that_IN its_PRP$ legislators_NN had_VBD been_VBN bribed_NN by_IN pinball-parlor_NN owners_NNS ._.
The_DT allegation_NN had_VBD been_VBN raised_VBD in_IN Parliament_NN by_IN the_DT governing_NN Liberal_NN Democratic_JJ Party_NN following_VBG magazine_NN reports_NNS suggesting_NN that_IN money_NN from_IN Japanese-style_NN pinball_NN ,_, called_VBN pachinko_NN ,_, had_VBD infiltrated_NN politics_NN ._.
Tsuruo_NN Yamaguchi_NN ,_, secretary_NN general_JJ of_IN the_DT Socialist_NNP Party_NNP ,_, acknowledged_VBD that_IN nine_NN party_NN lawmakers_NN had_VBD received_VBD donations_NN from_IN the_DT pachinko_NN association_NN totaling_NN 8_NN million_NN yen_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- about_IN $_$ 55,000_NN -RRB-_NN but_CC said_VBD the_DT donations_NN were_VBD legal_NN and_CC none_NN of_IN its_PRP$ members_NNS acted_NN to_TO favor_NN the_DT industry_NN ._.
The_DT World_NNP Wide_NN Fund_NNP for_IN Nature_NN said_VBD that_IN Spain_NN ,_, Argentina_NN ,_, Thailand_NN and_CC Indonesia_NN were_VBD doing_NN too_NN little_JJ to_TO prevent_VB illegal_JJ trade_NN in_IN endangered_NN wildlife_NN across_IN their_PRP$ borders_NNS ._.

Pauline_NNP Yoshihashi_NNP in_IN Los_NNP Angeles_NNP contributed_VBD to_TO this_DT column_NN ._.
Of_IN all_DT the_DT one-time_NN expenses_NN incurred_VBN by_IN a_DT corporation_NN or_CC professional_JJ firm_NN ,_, few_JJ are_VBP larger_NN or_CC longer_RB term_NN than_IN the_DT purchase_NN of_IN real_JJ estate_NN or_CC the_DT signing_NN of_IN a_DT commercial_JJ lease_NN ._.
To_TO take_VB full_JJ advantage_NN of_IN the_DT financial_JJ opportunities_NNS in_IN this_DT commitment_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT corporation_NN or_CC professional_JJ firm_NN must_MD do_VBP more_JJR than_IN negotiate_NN the_DT best_JJS purchase_NN price_NN or_CC lease_NN terms_NN ._.
It_PRP must_MD also_RB evaluate_NN the_DT real-estate_NN market_NN in_IN the_DT chosen_JJ location_NN from_IN a_DT new_JJ perspective_NN ._.
Specifically_RB ,_, it_PRP must_MD understand_VB how_WRB real-estate_NN markets_NNS overreact_NN to_TO shifts_NN in_IN regional_JJ economies_NNS and_CC then_RB take_VB advantage_NN of_IN these_DT opportunities_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT regional_NN economy_NN catches_NN cold_JJ ,_, the_DT local_JJ real-estate_NN market_NN gets_VBZ pneumonia_NN ._.
In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, real-estate_NN market_NN indicators_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN building_NN permits_VBZ and_CC leasing_NN activity_NN ,_, plummet_VBP much_JJ further_JJ than_IN a_DT local_JJ economy_NN in_IN recession_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD seen_VBN in_IN the_DT late_JJ 1960s_NNS in_IN Los_NNP Angeles_NNP and_CC the_DT mid-1970s_NNS in_IN New_NNP York_NNP ._.
But_CC the_DT reverse_NN is_VBZ also_RB true_JJ :_: When_WRB a_DT region_NN 's_POS economy_NN rebounds_NN from_IN a_DT slowdown_NN ,_, these_DT real-estate_NN indicators_NN will_MD rebound_NN far_RB faster_RBR than_IN the_DT improving_VBG economy_NN ._.
Why_WRB do_VBP local_NN real-estate_NN markets_NNS overreact_NN to_TO regional_NN economic_NN cycles_NN ?_.
Because_IN real-estate_NN purchases_NNS and_CC leases_NN are_VBP such_JJ major_JJ long-term_JJ commitments_NNS that_IN most_JJS companies_NNS and_CC individuals_NNS make_VB these_NN decisions_NN only_RB when_WRB confident_NN of_IN future_JJ economic_JJ stability_NN and_CC growth_NN ._.
Metropolitan_NNP Detroit_NN was_VBD written_VBN off_RP economically_NN during_NN the_DT early_JJ 1980s_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT domestic_JJ auto_NN industry_NN suffered_VBD a_DT serious_JJ sales_NNS depression_NN and_CC adjustment_NN ._.
Area_NN employment_NN dropped_VBD by_IN 13_CD %_NN from_IN its_PRP$ 1979_NN peak_NN and_CC retail_JJ sales_NNS were_VBD down_RB 14_CD %_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, the_DT real-estate_NN market_NN was_VBD hurt_VBN even_RB more_JJR ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, residential_NN building_NN permits_VBZ in_IN the_DT trough_NN year_NN of_IN 1982_CD were_VBD off_RP 76_NN %_NN from_IN the_DT 1979_CD peak_NN level_NN ._.
Once_RB metropolitan_NN Detroit_NN 's_POS economy_NN rallied_VBD in_IN the_DT mid-1980s_NNS ,_, real_JJ estate_NN rebounded_VBD ._.
Building_NNP permits_VBZ ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, soared_NN a_DT staggering_NN 400_NN %_NN between_IN 1982_CD and_CC the_DT peak_NN year_NN of_IN 1986_CD ._.
Where_WRB ,_, savvy_NN corporations_NN and_CC professional_JJ firms_NNS are_VBP now_RB asking_VBG ,_, are_VBP today_NN 's_POS opportunities_NN ?_.
Look_NN no_DT further_JJ than_IN metropolitan_NN Houston_NNP and_CC Denver_NNP ,_, two_CD of_IN the_DT most_JJS depressed_JJ ,_, overbuilt_NN and_CC potentially_NN undervalued_NN real-estate_NN markets_NNS in_IN the_DT nation_NN ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, some_DT observers_NNS have_VBP touted_NN Houston_NNP and_CC Denver_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ five_CD years_NNS as_IN a_DT counter-cyclical_NN play_NN ._.
But_CC now_RB appears_NN to_TO be_VB the_DT time_NN to_TO act_VB ._.
Metropolitan_NNP Houston_NNP 's_POS economy_NN did_VBD drop_NN and_CC then_RB flatten_NN in_IN the_DT years_NNS after_IN its_PRP$ 1982_NN peak_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT mid-1980s_NNS ,_, employment_NN was_VBD down_RB as_IN much_JJ as_IN 5_CD %_NN from_IN the_DT 1982_CD peak_NN and_CC retail_JJ sales_NNS were_VBD off_RP 13_NN %_NN ._.
The_DT real-estate_NN market_NN suffered_VBD even_RB more_JJR severe_NN setbacks_NN ._.
Office_NNP construction_NN dropped_VBD 97_CD %_NN ._.
The_DT vacancy_NN rate_NN soared_NN more_JJR than_IN 20_CD %_NN in_IN nearly_RB every_DT product_NN category_NN ,_, and_CC more_JJR than_IN 30_CD %_NN of_IN office_NN space_NN was_VBD vacant_NN ._.
To_TO some_DT observers_NN ,_, the_DT empty_NN office_NN buildings_NN of_IN Houston_NNP 's_POS ``_`` see-through_NN skyline_NN ''_'' were_VBD indicative_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB troubled_JJ economy_NN ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, the_DT real-estate_NN market_NN had_VBD overreacted_NN ._.
Actually_RB ,_, the_DT region_NN 's_POS economy_NN retained_NN a_DT firm_NN foundation_NN ._.
Metropolitan_NNP Houston_NNP 's_POS population_NN has_VBZ held_VBN steady_JJ over_IN the_DT past_JJ six_CD years_NNS ._.
And_CC personal_JJ income_NN ,_, after_IN slumping_VBG in_IN the_DT mid-1980s_NNS ,_, has_VBZ returned_VBN to_TO its_PRP$ 1982_NN level_NN in_IN real_JJ dollar_NN terms_NNS ._.
Today_NN ,_, metropolitan_NN Houston_NNP 's_POS real-estate_NN market_NN is_VBZ poised_NN for_IN a_DT significant_JJ turnaround_NN ._.
More_JJR than_IN 42,000_NN jobs_NN were_VBD added_VBD in_IN metro_NN Houston_NNP last_JJ year_NN ,_, primarily_RB in_IN biotechnology_NN ,_, petrochemical_NN processing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT computer_NN industry_NN ._.
This_DT growth_NN puts_NN Houston_NNP in_IN the_DT top_JJ five_CD metro_NN areas_NNS in_IN the_DT nation_NN last_JJ year_NN ._.
And_CC forecasts_NN project_NN a_DT 2.5_NN %_NN to_TO 3_CD %_NN growth_NN rate_NN in_IN jobs_NNS over_IN the_DT next_JJ few_JJ years_NNS --_: nearly_NN twice_RB the_DT national_JJ average_JJ ._.
Denver_NN is_VBZ another_DT metropolitan_NN area_NN where_WRB the_DT commercial_JJ real-estate_NN market_NN has_VBZ overreacted_NN to_TO the_DT region_NN 's_POS economic_JJ trends_NN ,_, although_IN Denver_NN has_VBZ not_RB experienced_VBN as_IN severe_JJ an_DT economic_NN downturn_NN as_IN Houston_NNP ._.
By_IN some_DT measures_NNS ,_, metropolitan_NN Denver_NN 's_POS economy_NN has_VBZ actually_RB improved_VBN in_IN the_DT past_JJ four_CD years_NNS ._.
Its_PRP$ population_NN has_VBZ continued_VBD to_TO increase_NN since_IN 1983_CD ,_, the_DT peak_NN year_NN of_IN the_DT economic_JJ cycle_NN ._.
Employment_NN is_VBZ now_RB 4_CD %_NN higher_JJR than_IN in_IN 1983_NN ._.
Buying_VBG income_NN in_IN real_JJ dollars_NNS actually_RB increased_VBN 15_NN %_NN between_IN 1983_CD and_CC 1987_CD -LRB-_-LRB- the_DT most_JJS recent_NN year_NN available_JJ -RRB-_NN ._.
The_DT rates_NNS of_IN increase_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, are_VBP less_JJR than_IN the_DT rapid_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT boom_NN years_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT has_VBZ resulted_VBD in_IN a_DT loss_NN of_IN confidence_NN in_IN the_DT economy_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT self-fulfilling_NN prophecy_NN ,_, therefore_NN ,_, the_DT region_NN 's_POS real-estate_NN market_NN all_DT but_CC collapsed_VBD in_IN recent_JJ years_NNS ._.
Housing_NNP building_NN permits_VBZ are_VBP down_RB more_JJR than_IN 75_CD %_NN from_IN their_PRP$ 1983_NN peaks_NN ._.
Although_IN no_DT one_CD can_MD predict_VBP when_NN metropolitan_NN Denver_NN 's_POS real-estate_NN market_NN will_MD rebound_NN ,_NN major_JJ public_JJ works_NNS projects_NN costing_NN several_JJ billion_NN dollars_NNS are_VBP under_IN way_NN or_CC planned_VBN --_: such_JJ as_IN a_DT new_JJ convention_NN center_NN ,_, a_DT major_JJ beltway_NN encircling_NN the_DT metropolitan_NN area_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT new_JJ regional_JJ airport_NN ._.

Walter_NNP Sisulu_NNP and_CC the_DT African_JJ National_NNP Congress_NNP came_VBD home_NN yesterday_NN ._.
After_IN 26_NN years_NNS in_IN prison_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Sisulu_NNP ,_, the_DT 77-year-old_NN former_JJ secretary-general_NN of_IN the_DT liberation_NN movement_NN ,_, was_VBD dropped_VBD off_RP at_IN his_PRP$ house_NN by_IN a_DT prison_NN services_NNS '_POS van_NN just_RB as_IN the_DT sun_NN was_VBD coming_VBG up_RP ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, six_CD ANC_NN colleagues_NN ,_, five_CD of_IN whom_WP were_VBD arrested_VBN with_IN him_PRP in_IN 1963_NN and_CC sentenced_NN to_TO life_NN imprisonment_NN ,_, were_VBD reunited_NN with_IN their_PRP$ families_NN at_IN various_JJ places_NNS around_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
And_CC as_IN the_DT graying_VBG men_NN returned_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NN ,_, the_DT ANC_NNP ,_, outlawed_VBN in_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP since_IN 1960_NN and_CC still_RB considered_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT chief_JJ public_JJ enemy_NN by_IN the_DT white_JJ government_NN ,_, defiantly_NN returned_VBN to_TO the_DT streets_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN 's_POS black_JJ townships_NN ._.
A_DT huge_JJ ANC_NNP flag_NN ,_, with_IN black_JJ ,_, green_NN and_CC gold_NN stripes_NN ,_, was_VBD hoisted_NN over_IN the_DT rickety_NN gate_NN at_IN Mr._NNP Sisulu_NN 's_POS modest_JJ house_NN ,_, while_IN on_IN the_DT street_NN out_RP front_NN ,_, boys_NN displayed_NN the_DT ANC_NN colors_NN on_IN their_PRP$ shirts_NN ,_, caps_NN and_CC scarves_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT small_JJ four-room_NN home_NN of_IN Elias_NN Motsoaledi_NN ,_, a_DT leading_VBG ANC_NN unionist_NN and_CC a_DT former_JJ commander_NN in_IN the_DT group_NN 's_POS armed_NN wing_NN ,_, Umkhonto_NN we_PRP Sizwe_NN ,_, well-wishers_NN stuck_VBN little_JJ ANC_NN flags_NN in_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN and_CC a_DT man_NN tooted_NN on_IN an_DT antelope_NN horn_NN wrapped_NN in_IN ANC_NN ribbons_NN ._.

As_IN the_DT crowd_NN outside_IN his_PRP$ home_NN shouted_NN ``_`` ANC_NN ,_, ANC_NN ,_, ''_'' the_DT old_JJ man_NN shot_NN his_PRP$ fists_NN into_IN the_DT air_NN ._.
``_`` I_PRP 'm_VBP inspired_NN by_IN the_DT mood_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._. ''_''
Under_IN the_DT laws_NNS of_IN the_DT land_NN ,_, the_DT ANC_NNP remains_VBZ an_DT illegal_NN organization_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ headquarters_NN are_VBP still_RB in_IN Lusaka_NN ,_, Zambia_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT unconditional_NN release_NN of_IN the_DT seven_CD leaders_NNS ,_, who_WP once_RB formed_VBN the_DT intellectual_NN and_CC organizational_NN core_NN of_IN the_DT ANC_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT de_IN facto_NN unbanning_NN of_IN the_DT movement_NN and_CC the_DT rebirth_NN of_IN its_PRP$ internal_JJ wing_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT government_NN can_MD never_RB put_VB the_DT ANC_NN back_RB into_IN the_DT bottle_NN again_RB ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Cassim_NN Saloojee_NN ,_, a_DT veteran_NN anti-apartheid_NN activist_NN on_IN hand_NN to_TO welcome_VB Mr._NNP Sisulu_NN ._.

There_EX 's_POS no_DT turning_NN back_RB ._. ''_''
There_EX was_VBD certainly_RB no_DT stopping_NN the_DT tide_NN of_IN ANC_NN emotion_NN last_JJ night_NN ,_, when_WRB hundreds_NN of_IN people_NNS jammed_NN into_IN the_DT Holy_NN Cross_NN Anglican_NN Church_NN in_IN Soweto_NNP for_IN what_WP became_VBD the_DT first_JJ ANC_NNP rally_NN in_IN the_DT country_NN in_IN 30_CD years_NNS ._.
Deafening_NN chants_NN of_IN ``_`` ANC_NN ''_'' and_CC ``_`` Umkhonto_NN we_PRP Sizwe_NN ''_NN shook_NN the_DT church_NN as_IN the_DT seven_CD aging_NN men_NN vowed_VBD that_IN the_DT ANC_NNP would_MD continue_VB its_PRP$ fight_NN against_IN the_DT government_NN and_CC the_DT policies_NN of_IN racial_JJ segregation_NN on_IN all_DT fronts_NNS ,_, including_VBG the_DT armed_VBN struggle_NN ._.
And_CC they_PRP called_VBN on_IN the_DT government_NN to_TO release_VB Nelson_NN Mandela_NN ,_, the_DT ANC_NNP 's_POS leading_VBG figure_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD jailed_NN with_IN them_PRP and_CC remains_VBZ in_IN prison_NN ._.
Without_IN him_PRP ,_, said_VBD Mr._NNP Sisulu_NNP ,_, the_DT freeing_NN of_IN the_DT others_NNS ``_`` is_VBZ only_RB a_DT half-measure_NN ._. ''_''
President_NNP F.W._NN de_IN Klerk_NN released_VBN the_DT ANC_NNP men_NN --_: along_IN with_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT founding_NN members_NNS of_IN the_DT Pan_NNP Africanist_NN Congress_NN ,_, a_DT rival_JJ liberation_NN group_NN --_: as_IN part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO create_VB a_DT climate_NN of_IN trust_NN and_CC peace_NN in_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ government_NN can_MD begin_VB negotiations_NNS with_IN black_JJ leaders_NNS over_IN a_DT new_JJ constitution_NN aimed_VBN at_IN giving_VBG blacks_NN a_DT voice_NN in_IN national_JJ government_NN ._.
But_CC Pretoria_NNP may_MD instead_NN be_VB creating_NN a_DT climate_NN for_IN more_JJR turmoil_NN and_CC uncertainty_NN in_IN this_DT racially_RB divided_VBN country_NN ._.
As_IN other_JJ repressive_NN governments_NNS ,_, particularly_RB Poland_NN and_CC the_DT Soviet_JJ Union_NNP ,_, have_VBP recently_NN discovered_VBN ,_, initial_NN steps_NNS to_TO open_JJ up_RP society_NN can_MD create_VB a_DT momentum_NN for_IN radical_JJ change_NN that_IN becomes_NN difficult_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB impossible_JJ ,_, to_TO control_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT days_NNS go_VB by_IN ,_, the_DT South_NNP African_JJ government_NN will_MD be_VB ever_RB more_JJR hard_JJ pressed_NN to_TO justify_VB the_DT continued_VBD imprisonment_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Mandela_NN as_IN well_RB as_IN the_DT continued_VBD banning_NN of_IN the_DT ANC_NNP and_CC enforcement_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN of_IN emergency_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP does_VBZ n't_RB yield_VB on_IN these_DT matters_NNS ,_, and_CC eventually_RB begin_VBP talking_VBG directly_NN to_TO the_DT ANC_NNP ,_, the_DT expectations_NNS and_CC promise_NN raised_VBD by_IN yesterday_NN 's_POS releases_NN will_MD turn_VB to_TO disillusionment_NN and_CC unrest_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP does_VBZ ,_, the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN right-wing_NN whites_NN ,_, who_WP oppose_NN any_DT concessions_NN to_TO the_DT black_JJ majority_NN ,_, will_MD step_NN up_RP their_PRP$ agitation_NN and_CC threats_NN to_TO take_VB matters_NNS into_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS ._.
The_DT newly_RB released_VBN ANC_NN leaders_NN also_RB will_MD be_VB under_IN enormous_NN pressure_NN ._.
The_DT government_NN is_VBZ watching_NN closely_NN to_TO see_VB if_IN their_PRP$ presence_NN in_IN the_DT townships_NN leads_VBZ to_TO increased_VBN anti-government_JJ protests_NNS and_CC violence_NN ;_: if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ ,_, Pretoria_NNP will_MD use_NN this_DT as_IN a_DT reason_NN to_TO keep_VB Mr._NNP Mandela_NN behind_IN bars_NN ._.

In_IN addition_NN ,_, the_DT government_NN is_VBZ figuring_NN that_IN the_DT releases_NN could_MD create_VB a_DT split_NN between_IN the_DT internal_JJ and_CC external_JJ wings_NN of_IN the_DT ANC_NNP and_CC between_NN the_DT newly_NN freed_NN leaders_NNS and_CC those_DT activists_NN who_WP have_VBP emerged_NN as_IN leaders_NN inside_IN the_DT country_NN during_IN their_PRP$ imprisonment_NN ._.

The_DT men_NNS also_RB will_MD be_VB faced_VBN with_IN bridging_NN the_DT generation_NN gap_NN between_IN themselves_PRP and_CC the_DT country_NN 's_POS many_JJ militant_NN black_JJ youths_NN ,_, the_DT so-called_JJ young_JJ lions_NN who_WP are_VBP anxious_JJ to_TO see_VB the_DT old_JJ lions_NN in_IN action_NN ._.
Says_VBZ Peter_NN Mokaba_NN ,_, president_NN of_IN the_DT South_NNP African_JJ Youth_NN Congress_NNP :_: ``_`` We_PRP will_MD be_VB expecting_NN them_PRP to_TO act_NN like_IN leaders_NN of_IN the_DT ANC_NNP ._. ''_''
